title: Error when importing an image after upgrade
content:
When a user tries to import an image using Image Aggregation after the suite upgrade, the following error message appears:

Dependent <cloud_provider> capsule is missing. Download and install the same from ITOM Marketplace and try again.

This issue can occur with any cloud provider such as AWS, Azure, GCP, or vCenter.

Cause

The dependent/required capsule isn't installed on the suite.

Solution

  1. Download and install the latest capsule from ITOM Marketplace. 
  2. Try to import the image again.
